select user_id as userId, IFNULL(provider_id, '') as providerId, email as email, username as username, phone, CONCAT( substring(phone, 1, 3), '-', substring(phone, 4, 4), '-', substring(phone, 8, 4) ) as phoneStr, role as role, IFNULL(provider, '') as provider, CONCAT( '(', zipcode, ') ', CASE WHEN state in ('제주','강원','경기') THEN CONCAT(state,'도 ', city) WHEN state in ('경남') THEN CONCAT('경상남도 ', city) WHEN state in ('경북') THEN CONCAT('경상북도 ', city) WHEN state in ('전남') THEN CONCAT('전라남도 ', city) WHEN state in ('전북') THEN CONCAT('전라북도 ', city) WHEN state in ('충남') THEN CONCAT('충청남도 ', city) WHEN state in ('충북') THEN CONCAT('충청북도 ', city) ELSE city END, ' ', address_line1, ' ', address_line2 ) as addressStr, CASE status WHEN 'ACTIVE' THEN '활동' WHEN 'DEACTIVATED' THEN '비활동' ELSE '' END AS statusStr, zipcode as zipcode, address_line1 as addressLine1, address_line2 as addressLine2, city as city, state as state, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as createdAtStr, created_by as createdBy, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(modified_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as modifiedAtStr, modified_by as modifiedBy from USER
where 1=1
and username like '%${username}%'
and phone like '%${phone}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and user_id = ${userId}

where user_id = ${paramId}

select user_id as userId, email , username , CONCAT( substring(phone, 1, 3), '-', substring(phone, 4, 4), '-', substring(phone, 8, 4) ) as phoneStr, role , IFNULL(provider, '') as provider, CONCAT( zipcode, '-', address_line1, '-', address_line2, '-', city, '-', state) as addressStr, status, CASE status WHEN 'ACTIVE' THEN '활동' WHEN 'DEACTIVATED' THEN '비활동' ELSE '' END AS statusStr, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as createdAtStr, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(modified_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as modifiedAtStr from USER

mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, modified_at = now() WHERE user_id = ${userId}

select hosp_reservation_id as hospReservationId, -- 예약 번호 h.yadm_nm as yadmNm, -- 병원 이름 u.user_id as userId, -- 회원 ID u.username as username, -- 회원 이름 IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as reservationAt, -- 예약 날짜 reservation_time as reservationTime, -- 예약 시간 CASE reservation_status WHEN 'SUCCESS' THEN '예약' WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN '취소' ELSE '' END AS reservationStatus -- 예약 상태 from HOSPITAL_RESERVATION hr join USER u on hr.user_id=u.user_id join hospital h on hr.hosp_id=h.hosp_id WHERE 1=1
and username like '%${username}%'
and yadm_nm like '%${yadmNm}%'
and reservation_status like '%{reservationStatus}%'
and hosp_reservation_id = ${hospReservationId}
order by reservation_at desc ,reservation_time desc

-- 사용 버전 select hosp_reservation_id as hospReservationId, -- 예약 번호 h.yadm_nm as yadmNm, -- 병원 이름 u.user_id as userId, -- 회원 ID u.username as username, -- 회원 이름 IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as reservationAt, -- 예약 날짜 reservation_time as reservationTime, -- 예약 시간 CASE reservation_status WHEN 'SUCCESS' THEN '예약' WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN '취소' ELSE '' END AS reservationStatus -- 예약 상태 from HOSPITAL_RESERVATION hr join USER u on hr.user_id=u.user_id join hospital h on hr.hosp_id=h.hosp_id where hosp_reservation_id = ${paramId}
-- 회원: Active select count(*) from USER where status='ACTIVE'
-- 회원: Deactivated select count(*) from USER where status='DEACTIVATED'
-- 회원: 전체 select count(*) from USER

-- 병원: 지역 SELECT CASE sido_cd_nm WHEN '세종시' THEN '세종' ELSE sido_cd_nm END AS sidoCdNm, COUNT(sido_cd_nm) AS cnt FROM hospital WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY sido_cd_nm order by
sido_cd_nm asc
cnt asc
cnt desc

-- 진요얘약: 기간(최근 3개월) -- 진요얘약: 기간(최근 3개월) SELECT TA.yearmonth,TA.cnt from ( -- 이번달 진료 예약 건수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), "%Y-%m") union -- 이전달 진료 예약 건 수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), "%Y-%m") union -- 두달 진료 예약 건 수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), "%Y-%m") union -- 세달 진료 예약 건 수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), "%Y-%m") union -- 네달 진료 예약 건 수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 MONTH), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 MONTH), "%Y-%m") union -- 다섯달 진료 예약 건 수 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH), "%Y-%m")as yearmonth ,COUNT(reservation_at) AS cnt FROM HOSPITAL_RESERVATION where DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH), "%Y-%m") ) TA order by TA.yearmonth
